RomCom.title: RomCom
RomCom.description: RomCom is a very easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring CVE-2025-8088 abuse examination, UsnJournal and $MFT parsing, and pinpointing the timestamps of crucial events.

ElectricBreeze-1.title: ElectricBreeze-1
ElectricBreeze-1.description: ElectricBreeze-1 is a very easy-difficulty TI sherlock involving usage of the MITRE ATT&CK framework to learn more about the malicious group, and reading publicly available articles to gather crucial information.

DroidPhish.title: DroidPhish
DroidPhish.description: DroidPhish is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on analysis of a phishing incident, discovering a suspicious email message, and investigating a malicious APK file.

Unsupervised.title: Unsupervised
Unsupervised.description: Unsupervised is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring windows registry exploration, enumeration of registered USB drives, investigating jump lists for copied files and analyzing thumbcache databases.

Anpu.title: Anpu
Anpu.description: Anpu is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving analysis of a multi-purpose trojan distributed via Discord, examining overlay attacks and ransomware capabilities through Android forensics and APK reverse engineering.

PercyPay.title: PercyPay
PercyPay.description: PercyPay is an easy-difficulty Cloud sherlock focusing on log analysis of an attack chain involving credential exposure, privilege escalation through Lambda functions, security evasion, and customer data exfiltration.

TeamWork.title: TeamWork
TeamWork.description: TeamWork is an easy-difficulty TI sherlock featuring analysis of a social engineering campaign, investigating fake NFT gaming infrastructure, tracing malicious files through archived websites, and mapping the TA's tactics.

ReliableThreat.title: ReliableThreat
ReliableThreat.description: ReliableThreat is a medium-difficulty DFIR sherlock focusing on tracing a malicious VSCode extension infection chain, analyzing the malware files, pinpointing the attacker's actions and describing the techniques they used.

Origins.title: Origins
Origins.description: Origins is a very easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving analysis of a PCAP file, discovering a successful bruteforce attack targeting FTP, and assessing the potential impact of the attack,

Kuber.title: Kuber
Kuber.description: Kuber is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock featuring Kubernetes cluster examination, and finding a malicious pod.

Loggy.title: Loggy
Loggy.description: Loggy is an easy-difficulty malware analysis sherlock focusing on reverse engineering of a keylogger written in Golang, analyzing its data exfiltration mechanisms and extracting compromised credentials.

Psittaciformes.title: Psittaciformes
Psittaciformes.description: Psittaciformes is an easy-difficulty DFIR sherlock involving log analysis, bash history forensics, git repository analysis and code review.

Compromised.title: Compromised
Compromised.description: Compromised is an easy-difficulty SOC sherlock involving PCAP analysis of a Pikabot malware infection, focusing on initial access vectors and C2 infrastructure identification.
